All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, DataSourceListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, TestSetListener, TextListener, TrainingSetListener, UserRequestAcceptor, Visible
public class TextViewer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TextListener, DataSourceListener, TrainingSetListener, TestSetListener, Visible, UserRequestAcceptor, java.io.Serializable
